alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Juniata; Perry (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 2:15PM EDT until September 07 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cumberland County in south central Pennsylvania... Central Juniata County in central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Perry County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 214 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Big Spring State Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Spruce Hill, Colonel Denning State Park, Loysville, Ickesburg, Port Royal, Blain, Landisburg and New Germantown. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 205 to 206. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
